law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 7, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1235, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 11, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
